body_html:
Have you tried r1.0 with bazel 0.5.2?

My best guess at the cause is that something is causing it to evaluate the wrong paths when searching the SDK directory looking for API level (it's trying to evaluate "MNC" from a partial path as an integer).

You might have better luck over at https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel with this, as I doubt it has anything directly to do with TF.

body:
Have you tried r1.0 with bazel 0.5.2?

My best guess at the cause is that something is causing it to evaluate the wrong paths when searching the SDK directory looking for API level (it's trying to evaluate "MNC" from a partial path as an integer).

You might have better luck over at https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel with this, as I doubt it has anything directly to do with TF.
